text: assalaamu alayka ya sayeedul bathaae wabna raisiha.
assalaamu alayka ya waresal kaabate baada taasisiha…
assalaamu alayka ya walidal aimaatil huda, kafaaka bimaa awlaakallahu sharafan wa nasaban wa hasbuka bimaa aataakallahu izzan wa hasaba.
assalamu alayka yaman ruziqa waladan huwa khairu mawluud.
assalaamu alyka yaman khussisa bil walidiz-zakiyattahiril mutahharil aliye.aliyun ushtuka ismuhu minal aliye
hanian laka summa min waladin huwal murtaza min rusulin wa akhsaruli wa zawjul batul wasaifullahi maslul,
hanian laka summa hanian min waladin huwa min muhammadinil mustafa bi mazilayi harun bin musa,
hanian laka min waladin huwa sharikun nabuwwati was makhsusu bil ukhuwwah, wa kaashiful ghummaha wa imamul ummah, wa abul aimmah
hanian laka min waladin huwa qasimul jannati wannar, wa niamatullahi alal abrar, wa nikmatullahi alal fujjar.
assalaamu alyk wa alaihi wa alaihim warahmatullahi wa barakatuh
